meanings.sent1: The symmetricalness of the butterfly's wings was truly beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully ensured the symmetricalness of the painting.
meanings.sent3: The symmetricalness of the cake layers made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The symmetricalness of the garden was so perfect, it seemed almost unreal.
meanings.sent5: The symmetricalness of the snowflake was mesmerizing to behold.

meanings.definition: The state of having balanced proportions.
meanings.sent1: Her symmetricalness in height and weight made her a great athlete.
meanings.sent2: The symmetricalness of the building's design was pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent3: The symmetricalness of the twins' faces was uncanny.
meanings.sent4: The symmetricalness of the equation made it easy to solve.
meanings.sent5: The symmetricalness of the tree branches created a harmonious pattern.

meanings.definition: The property of being evenly balanced.
meanings.sent1: The symmetricalness of the seesaw allowed the children to play safely.
meanings.sent2: The symmetricalness of the scales ensured accurate measurements.
meanings.sent3: The symmetricalness of the seesaw made it a popular playground attraction.
meanings.sent4: The symmetricalness of the bridge's design made it structurally sound.
meanings.sent5: The symmetricalness of the dancer's movements captivated the audience.
